name: Happy Golden Hen
description:
Happy Golden Hen is an amazing Merge Game to bring you happiness every day! And the whole game is completely free! Download for fun!
• More than 100 different kinds of cute hens can be collected: including chiefs, samurai, boxing champions, marines, etc.！
• Idle coin income: You can continue to earn coins even if you leave the game.
• Free acceleration: Free acceleration every day gives you double coin income.
• Don't wait! Come to Happy Golden Hen. If you have any question playing Happy Golden Hen, contact us through kfonshgfsx@gmail.com
